QuestData.Title: Kuo-Na Quillpaw
QuestData.Description: Most of the duels within the Cradle take place between two trainees. Rarely, when a trainee exhibits a rare amount of skill, they will have an opportunity to duel their trainer.$b$bToday, you duel against Kuo-Na. She will be waiting for you at the Pedestal of Hope.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Your first sparring match against your trainers!
